drawing

Inspired by my current boss and some other tech blogger, i see how easily they are to express their idea just by an image. Yes, instead of throwing out bunch of words, like what iam doing right now, just draw. So i decided to join a classroom, thanks to my current boss again, share to me his course, then i attempted, and doing daily drawing for practicing

Here the result after day 1

PS I always think that I’m really bad at drawing until yesterday, since the teacher said:

You always said you don’t know how to draw, but actually you do everyday Everytime you write an alphabet, you actually draw an arc and line and transform them to something which other people can understand
